guest_to_member: Converting to a member gives you access to more features!
member_benefit1_desc: You can form teams with other users
member_benefit2_desc: You can freely modify your name, group, and profile image
member_benefit3_desc: You can compete in rankings with other users
member_benefit4_desc: You can view past game scores in a graph
